scripts.postinstall: npm --prefix ./node_modules/jsonresume-theme-kwan install ./node_modules/jsonresume-theme-kwan && npm run generate && npm run ghpages
scripts.generate: hackmyresume build resume.json TO dist/resume.all -t node_modules/jsonresume-theme-kwan --pdf none && hackmyresume build resume.json TO dist/resume.txt dist/resume.md dist/resume.doc
scripts.ghpages: copyfiles -f "./dist/resume.html" ./ && npm run clean-ghpages && rename resume.html index.html
